'''1.21.73''' is a hotfix for {{BE}} released on April 11, 2025 for Windows and servers, which fixes a bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/35674713271949-Minecraft-1-21-72-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.72 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=April 8, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.73
|MCPE-212385|Game crashes on launch after 1.21.72 update
}}
	
== Trivia ==
*This is the final version to have [[Virtual reality|VR]] support.
